title: SEPT: Smart & Safe Solar Panels
description: Leading the development of intelligent solar panel technology that enhances safety and efficiency. SEPT integrates advanced monitoring systems to detect anomalies, prevent fires, and optimize energy production. Our mission is to make solar energy not just sustainable, but intelligent and reliable for communities worldwide.

title: N'Ko: Empowering West African Communities
description: Building climate resilience in West African communities through the N'Ko project. We're creating educational resources and tools in local languages to help communities understand and adapt to climate change. This initiative combines traditional knowledge with modern climate science to develop sustainable adaptation strategies that respect cultural heritage.

title: Solar Thermal Cogeneration Research
description: Pioneered research in solar thermal systems for simultaneous electricity generation and water desalination. This groundbreaking work addresses two critical challenges: energy security and water scarcity. The cogeneration approach maximizes resource efficiency, making it particularly valuable for arid regions where both electricity and fresh water are desperately needed.

title: Teaching AI Fundamentals
description: Demystifying artificial intelligence and empowering people to build practical AI tools. Through workshops, courses, and hands-on projects, I help students and professionals understand the fundamentals of machine learning and how to apply AI to solve real-world problems. The focus is on accessibility and practical application rather than theoretical complexity.

title: Energy Systems Engineering
description: Completed advanced studies in energy systems engineering, focusing on renewable energy integration and grid optimization. This academic foundation provided the technical expertise to tackle complex challenges in energy security and sustainable development. Research centered on making renewable energy more reliable and economically viable for developing regions.

title: Rural Electrification Projects
description: Led rural electrification initiatives bringing reliable electricity to underserved communities. These projects combined solar microgrids with community training programs, ensuring long-term sustainability. Witnessed firsthand how access to reliable energy transforms education, healthcare, and economic opportunities in rural areas.

title: Climate Data Analysis
description: Analyzed climate data patterns across West Africa to understand vulnerability and inform adaptation strategies. This work revealed critical insights about regional climate trends and their impact on agriculture, water resources, and energy systems. The findings continue to inform current resilience-building initiatives.

title: The Beginning: Discovering Purpose
description: The journey began with a simple question: How can we ensure everyone has access to clean, reliable energy? Growing up witnessing energy poverty and its impact on communities, I committed to dedicating my career to energy security and climate resilience. This marked the beginning of a mission that continues to drive everything I do today.
